name: Dodge Club Pocket
overview: The underground ravers of Dodge Club invite YOU to play in their pixel dance party. Dodge the red hot fireball and electric spark in 64 unique pixelated minigame challenges! You'll even unlock presents such as new characters, exclusive wallpapers, and bonus music! FEATURES ● Play 16x16 micro pixel arcade game challenges! ● Get the full original 8x8 Classic Dodge Club as an extra game mode! ● Clear 64 unique challenges and earn stars! ● Stylish character designs by Linzb0t! ● Unlock hot wallpapers, and exclusive music by Tommy Pedrini & DJ Bouche! See you in the ring, ravers!~
